name: I am Light
description:
This is a game made as a project for a 5 days Game-jam. A finished product, creativity and an out of the box idea were essential in which this game shined and lit up to the top!

Must give it a try! Enjoy!

This game was made using "Unity's" game engine while using 'Audacity' for audio editing and '3ds max' for modeling

Check my Portfolio here!
